channel.title: stitching on HowIsJT
channel.description: Recent content in stitching on HowIsJT

item.title: 12. Joining Deck to Hull
item.description: We’re really building boats! Work was completed on the interior of decks and hulls, allowing the pairs to be bonded together - forever taking the shape of kayaks.

item.title: 9. Chill Out!
item.description: Winter has arrived in south Louisiana as evidenced by this icicle dangling from a hose bib. The cool weather halts epoxy work as it won’t cure.

item.title: 7. Project Resumes
item.description: Divine providence has provided an opportunity to resume building kayaks.
